title: Change of Guards ceremony held at Mazar-e-Quaid
content:
KARACHI, Sep 06 (APP): A smartly turned out contingent of the cadets from the Pakistan Air Force assumed ceremonial guard duties at the mausoleum of Quaid with traditional spirit and customary enthusiasm.
A contingent of cadets from Pakistan Air Force Academy, Asghar Khan took over the Guard duties. The contingent comprised of 46 cadets including 3 female cadets, said a news release issued here on Sunday.
Air Vice Marshal Shakeel Ghazanfar was the chief guest on the occasion.
The guest offered Fateha and laidÂ  wreath at Mazar-e-Quaid.
